cards.title: The Elementalist
setup: At the start of the game, {TheElementalist} enters play "Master of the Elements" side up.
Search the villain deck for 10 glyph cards and put them into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: If there are ever no glyphs in play, {TheElementalist} flips.
When {TheElementalist} would be destroyed, he flips instead.
cards.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to {TheElementalist} by 1 for each glyph in play.
cards.challengeText: At the end of the villain turn, all Villain targets regain X HP, where X is the number of glyphs in play
flippedGameplay: Whenever {TheElementalist} flips to this side, restore him to full HP. Then destroy all glyphs in play. For each glyphs destroyed this way, the elementalist deals himself X damage of that glyph's type, where X is that glyph's HP. Shuffle the villain trash into the villain deck.
Whenever a glyph is played, play the top card of the villain deck.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.flippedAdvnced: When {TheElementalist} plays a spell that checks if a specific glyph is in play, treat it as though that glyph is in play.

cards.title: Intangibility
body: {Intangibility} is immune to melee damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to melee damage.

cards.title: Windwall
body: {Windwall} is immune to projectile damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to projectile damage.

cards.title: Flame Barrier
body: {FlameBarrier} is immune to fire damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to fire damage.

cards.title: Frost Shield
body: {FrostShield} is immune to cold damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to cold damage.

cards.title: Grounding
body: {Grounding} is immune to lightning damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to lightning damage.

cards.title: Antitoxin
body: {Antitoxin} is immune to toxic damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to toxic damage.

cards.title: Aura of Silence
body: {AuraOfSilence} is immune to sonic damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to sonic damage.

cards.title: Mind Blank
body: {MindBlank} is immune to psychic damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to psychic damage.

cards.title: Holy Aspect
body: {HolyAspect} is immune to radiant damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to radiant damage.

cards.title: Unholy Aspect
body: {UnholyAspect} is immune to infernal damage.
{TheElementalist} is immune to infernal damage.

cards.title: Meteor Rain
body: {TheElementalist} deals each non-villain target {H} fire damage.
If {FlameBarrier} is in play, {TheElementalist} deals each non-villain target {H} fire damage.

cards.title: Ice Storm
body: {TheElementalist} deals the {H-2} hero characters with the highest HP 3 cold damage.
If {FrostShield} is in play, characters dealt damage this way cannot use powers until the start of the villain turn.

cards.title: Lightning Bolt
body: {TheElementalist} deals the {H-2} hero characters with the lowest HP 1 lightning damage.
If {Grounding} is in play, characters dealt damage this way cannot deal damage until the start of the villain turn.

cards.title: Acid Cloud
body: {TheElementalist} deals each non-villain target 1 toxic damage.
If {Antitoxin} is in play, destroy all hero equipment cards.

cards.title: Sonic Boom
body: {TheElementalist} deals each non-villain target 1 sonic damage.
If {AuraOfSilence} is in play, heroes dealt damage this way cannot play cards until the start of the villain turn.

cards.title: Mind Crush
body: {TheElementalist} deals each non-villain target 1 psychic damage.
If {MindBlank} is in play, destroy all hero ongoing cards.

cards.title: Channel Light
body: {TheElementalist} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} radiant damage.
If {HolyAspect} is in play, all villain targets regain {H} HP.

cards.title: Channel Darkness
body: {TheElementalist} deals the {H-2} hero targets with the lowest HP {H} infernal damage.
If {UnholyAspect} is in play, all hero characters damaged this way discard all but 1 card.

cards.title: Scribe Glyph
body: Put a random glyph from the villain trash into play.
If you do, that glyph deals each hero target 1 damage of its damage type.
Otherwise, all glyphs regain 1 HP.
Play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Prismatic Blast
body: Each glyph in play deals 1 damage of its type to all non-villain targets.
If there are no glyph cards in play, play the top card of the villain deck.

cards.title: Time Stop
body: Play the top 2 cards of the villain deck.

cards.title: Prismatic Glyphs
body: If any glyphs are in play, {TheElementalist} is immune to damage.
